verses.name: Judges 14:10
verses.text: So his father went down unto the woman: and Samson made there a feast; for so used the young men to do.

verses.name: Judges 14:11
verses.text: And it came to pass, when they saw him, that they brought thirty companions to be with him.

verses.name: Judges 14:12
verses.text: And Samson said unto them, I will now put forth a riddle unto you: if ye can certainly declare it me within the seven days of the feast, and find it out, then I will give you thirty sheets and thirty change of garments:
